reviews.review_msg: Sweet person and guaranteed to be the easiest class you'll ever take. All you have to do is show up and do a couple small projects. The final project was done in any way we wanted and any topic. All we had to do was present and it was so easy

Ridiculously easy class. It definitely requires most people to get out of their comfort zone, but I didn't mind playing at the park and dancing in class if it meant an easy A. Plus, the classroom community she created was beautiful! I made great friends in that class. Definitely recommend EDUC100W as a GPA booster.
